events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position at our company. Thank you for your interest and the time you took to apply.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department for further review based on your skills in software development and related experience.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to your case and will be in touch shortly to guide you through the next steps.
Our technical team completed the initial screening of your CV and found your software engineering background to be a strong match for the role.
You responded promptly expressing your enthusiasm and availability for the next stage of the hiring process, which is excellent.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 10th at 10 AM UTC with our senior engineering team to assess your coding and problem-solving skills.
The technical interview went well. The panel noted your strong programming abilities and problem-solving approach during the session.
Your HR interview has been scheduled for May 15th at 3 PM UTC. This will cover cultural fit, company values, and expectations.
You completed your HR interview successfully. Discussions highlighted your alignment with our company's culture and your career aspirations.
We are pleased to propose you an offer for the Software Engineer position, including competitive compensation and benefits tailored to your experience.
You have provided positive feedback on the offer and asked a few clarifying questions regarding onboarding and team structure.
You have officially accepted the job offer, and we are excited to welcome you onboard as part of our engineering team.
Your onboarding process has started. Welcome sessions, equipment delivery, and initial training schedules have been arranged.
The hiring process is now officially complete. We look forward to your contributions and success in your Software Engineer role.
